alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lander County through 215 PM PDT... At 145 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles northeast of New Pass Summit, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Lander County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
